title: A sign that looks like a chalk style font
content:
Looking for the font family/style for the "Breakfast" word. I tried a few online font identification website, wasn't able to find what font this was.

Font: 

 Abadi Mt Condensed Extra Bold 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140940/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [chalkdisplay.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140940/http:/typophile.com/files/AvhG1d9CeflT6kfxJxRN2FaMMqqVXQJMFZpwAu4IZ4uk%20(1).jpg) | 81.86 KB |
author: Toppy

comments.content:
It appears to be based on Abadi Condensed Extra Bold:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/abadi-mt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140940/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/abadi-mt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/abadi-mt/")

Perhaps the chalkboard effect is applied, and not part of the actual font?
